item.title: Top 5 Games 2021
item.description:
About this list! Before I list my top games of 2021 I want to make clear that this is purely a list of the games which I enjoyed the most in 2021. Meaning a few of the games released quite a few years prior. These aren’t reviews, and I will avoid spoilers! (Here is a full video of this article on my YouTube channel)
# 5. Chivalry 2. Most nights, when I have time to play games, I don’t have the energy for story heavy or intense gameplay sessions.
